original_text: And great crowds came to him, bringing with them the lame, the blind, the crippled, the mute, and many others, and they put them at his feet, and he healed them,
korean_text: 큰 무리가 다리 저는 사람과 장애인과 맹인과 말 못하는 사람과 기타 여럿을 데리고 와서 예수의 발 앞에 앉히매 고쳐 주시니

sentences.original_text: And great crowds came to him
bringing with them the lame, the blind, the crippled, the mute, and many others
sentences.korean_translation: 저희가 저는 자와 소경과 불구자와 벙어리와 다른 여러 사람을 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: and they put them at his feet
